alerts.title: Potential Astroturf Campaign Detected
alerts.description: The data shows several known patterns associated with potential astroturf activity, including groups with names like 'Keep Dallas Safe', 'Dallas Justice Now', 'Save Texas Kids', 'Protect Texas Kids', and 'Mission DFW'.

factors.name: Job Posting Spike
factors.description: Unusual increase in protest-related job listings

factors.name: Pattern Name
factors.description: Organization name matches known astroturf naming patterns

factors.name: Delaware Registration
factors.description: Out-of-state Delaware incorporation for local organization

factors.name: Event Timing
factors.description: Activity correlates with upcoming council vote or hearing

factors.name: Funding Opacity
factors.description: No disclosed funding sources or vague 990 filings
